General.Name: Duell Oyj
General.Description: Duell Oyj engages in the wholesale and distribution of powersports aftermarket products in Finland and the Nordic countries. It sells equipment, supplies and spare parts for motorcycles, snowmobiles, mopeds, all-terrain vehicles (ATVs), bicycles, watersports, and marine accessories. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Korsholm, Finland.
